rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;41442af8.1502">   <title>Housing Law Conference </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;41442af8.1502</link>   <description> Hi Paul<br><br>Could you announce via mailing list etc the following please:<br><br>The Housing Law Research Network and the Housing Law Working Group, European Network of Housing Research (ENHR) invite submissions on any field of housing law broadly conceived (including housing rights, nuisance, neighbour law, tenure, dispute resolution and litigation, anti-social behaviour etc) for the annual conference to be held in Lisbon, Portugal 30th June - 3rd July. Full details can be found at www.enhr2015.com&lt;http://www.enhr2015.com&gt; [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-23T10:31:52+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Julian Sidoli del Ceno</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;41442af8.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;184218d7.1501">   <title>Deadline for Papers - COBRA 2015 - Sydney, Australia - Wednesday 4th February 2015 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;184218d7.1501</link>   <description> COBRA Conference 2015 - Sydney, Australia, July 2015&lt;http://www.lawlectures.co.uk/w113/cobra2015.htm&gt;<br>CIB W113 - RICS Legal Research Symposium&lt;http://www.lawlectures.co.uk/w113/cobra2015.htm&gt;<br><br>[cid:image003.jpg@01CF9607.D648B3A0]&lt;http://www.lawlectures.co.uk/w113/cobra2015.htm&gt;<br><br>DEADLINE FOR PAPERS - 4th FEBRUARY 2015&lt;http://www.lawlectures.co.uk/w113/cobra2015.htm&gt;<br><br>A reminder - for those who have already had abstracts accepted - that the deadline for submission of papers for the COBRA 2015 conference is Wednesday 4th February 2015. I am advised that no extensions will be allowed beyond this date. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-19T10:22:34+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Chynoweth Paul</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;184218d7.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;e83ed883.1501">   <title>ESCL Master Thesis Prize 2015! </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;e83ed883.1501</link>   <description> Dear Friends<br><br>It gives me great pleasure to attach the flyer for this years ESCL Master\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds Thesis Prize. Please can you distribute this to as many people within your various organisations as possible as we would like as wide a spread of entrants as possible this year.<br><br>While writing I am also very happy to confirm that this years congress will take place in London from 1 to 3 October 2015. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-08T21:09:49+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Richard Bailey</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;e83ed883.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;5dee45aa.1412">   <title>Paper submission deadline - COBRA 2015 - Sydney, Australia - Wednesday 4th February 2015 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;5dee45aa.1412</link>   <description> COBRA Conference 2015 - Sydney, Australia, July 2015&lt;http://www.lawlectures.co.uk/w113/cobra2015.htm&gt;<br>CIB W113 - RICS Legal Research Symposium&lt;http://www.lawlectures.co.uk/w113/cobra2015.htm&gt;<br><br>[cid:image003.jpg@01CF9607.D648B3A0]&lt;http://www.lawlectures.co.uk/w113/cobra2015.htm&gt;<br><br>EXTENDED PAPER DEADLINE - 4th FEBRUARY 2015&lt;http://www.lawlectures.co.uk/w113/cobra2015.htm&gt;<br><br>I'm not sure if this information has already been circulated but I can confirm that the deadline for submission of full papers for the COBRA 2015 conference has been extended to Wednesday 4th February 2015. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-16T10:11:37+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Chynoweth Paul</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;5dee45aa.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;b0196db7.1410">   <title>Housing \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd Critical Futures - OPEN CALL and LAUNCH</title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;b0196db7.1410</link>   <description> Apologies for cross posting. Here is information on Housing \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd Critical Futures, an international program of conferences and events is launched for 2015-16.<br><br>AN OPEN CALL for two Inaugural Events:<br><br>CONFERENCE \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd OPEN CALL: http://architecturemps.com/housing-critical-perspective/ 08-09 April 2015<br><br>FILM SCREENINGS &amp; DEBATE: http://architecturemps.com/h-cfl-filmdebate/ 10 January 2015<br><br>EVENTS involve:<br><br>Patrick Keiler. Independent Filmmaker. Dilapidated Dwelling \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd film screening.<br>Avi Friedman. Architect / Housing Specialist. TBC. McGill University, Canada.<br>Loretta Lees. Human Geographer. University of Leicester<br>Luciana Berger, MP. Shadow Minister for Public Health, UK. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-30T20:14:55+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Graham Cairns</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;b0196db7.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;161fd5.1410">   <title>NEW Oxford DPhil (PhD) in Sustainable Urban Development with scholarship available </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;161fd5.1410</link>   <description> Dear colleagues,<br><br>*with apologies for cross posting*<br><br>The University of Oxford is delighted to announce the launch of a new part-time DPhil (PhD) in Sustainable Urban Development&lt;http://www.conted.ox.ac.uk/DSUD&gt;. We would be grateful if list members would share this information with students, colleagues and associates for whom it will be of interest.<br><br>The DPhil is a research doctorate, which culminates in a substantive academic thesis and performance in a viva voce. Successful candidates will have a very strong academic record and will show great aptitude through their academic proposal. Throughout their period of study, candidates will join a wider international community of [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-29T12:40:55+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Thompson, Chris</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;161fd5.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;7f53120d.1410">   <title>Law Around The World - Free to Read </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;7f53120d.1410</link>   <description> Dear colleagues,<br><br>I am delighted to share with you a free article and eBook collection on Law around the world. We have selected leading papers and grouped these into regions, such as Africa, the Americas, Asia, Europe and Oceania, to make your research into Law and legal practices around the globe easier and faster. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-09T10:17:04+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Melissa Phillips</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;7f53120d.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;448ded9d.1409">   <title>Groningen Symposium </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;448ded9d.1409</link>   <description>Full message available at: <a href="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;448ded9d.1409">Groningen Symposium </a></description>   <dc:date>2014-09-26T09:38:49+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Julian Sidoli del Ceno</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;448ded9d.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;6e66a3a8.1409">   <title>Call to publicise </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;6e66a3a8.1409</link>   <description>Full message available at: <a href="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;6e66a3a8.1409">Call to publicise </a></description>   <dc:date>2014-09-25T21:29:19+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Julian Sidoli del Ceno</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;6e66a3a8.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;81760cd1.1409">   <title>FINAL DAY - ABSTRACTS NOW DUE - COBRA - RICS Legal Research Symposium 2015 - Sydney, Australia </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;81760cd1.1409</link>   <description> FINAL CALL - LAST DAY FOR ABSTRACTS &lt;http://www.lawlectures.co.uk/w113/cobra2015.htm&gt;<br>COBRA Conference 2015 - Sydney, Australia, July 2015&lt;http://www.lawlectures.co.uk/w113/cobra2015.htm&gt;<br>CIB W113 - RICS Legal Research Symposium&lt;http://www.lawlectures.co.uk/w113/cobra2015.htm&gt;<br><br>[cid:image003.jpg@01CF9607.D648B3A0]&lt;http://www.lawlectures.co.uk/w113/cobra2015.htm&gt;<br><br>The final deadline for submission of abstracts is today / tomorrow, Friday 19th September 2014. Please note, due to the large volume of abstracts that have already been received, that no extensions will be granted beyond this date. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-18T16:27:26+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Chynoweth Paul</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;81760cd1.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;de239958.1409">   <title>FINAL CALL FOR ABSTRACTS - COBRA - RICS Legal Research Symposium 2015 - Sydney, Australia </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;de239958.1409</link>   <description> FINAL CALL - ABSTRACTS DUE IN ONE WEEK &lt;http://www.lawlectures.co.uk/w113/cobra2015.htm&gt;<br>COBRA Conference 2015 - Sydney, Australia, July 2015&lt;http://www.lawlectures.co.uk/w113/cobra2015.htm&gt;<br>CIB W113 - RICS Legal Research Symposium&lt;http://www.lawlectures.co.uk/w113/cobra2015.htm&gt;<br><br>[cid:image003.jpg@01CF9607.D648B3A0]&lt;http://www.lawlectures.co.uk/w113/cobra2015.htm&gt;<br><br>A final reminder that the ninth annual RICS Legal Research Symposium will take place in Sydney, Australia, between 8th and 10th July 2015. Once again, this is being organised by CIB Working Commission (W113) on Law and Dispute Resolution and supported by the International Journal of Law in the Built Environment. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-12T08:52:01+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Chynoweth Paul</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;de239958.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;d3bda309.1409">   <title>Fully funded PhD opportunity </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;d3bda309.1409</link>   <description> Housing and Dispute Resolution: social wellbeing and bottom up forms of community engagement<br><br>Full fee waiver plus an annual stipend of \ufffd\ufffd13,863. Deadline 24th October 2014<br><br>The housing crisis across much of Europe, and indeed other parts of the world, shows no sign of abating. The issue is particularly pressing in high-density urban settlements where the further problems of low income, immigration and lack of community engagement are often found. The solution is often deemed simply to be more housing, but this is often not achievable especially in the short term. There are further issues that are intimately linked to [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-10T16:04:19+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Julian Sidoli del Ceno</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;d3bda309.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;f66c32fe.1409">   <title>Housing \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd A Critical Perspective_Interdisciplinary Call</title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;f66c32fe.1409</link>   <description> Conference: 08-09 April 2015<br><br>Together with the Sociology Department of Liverpool University and the Architecture Department of Liverpool John Moores University, Architecture_MPS is organising a two day interdisciplinary conference on the theme of affordable housing provision. Forming part of a broader program of international events, Housing \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd Critical Futures, it is open to activists, artists and academics of all disciplines. It is set in the UK but seeks to link with global issues. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-10T15:25:54+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Graham Cairns</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;f66c32fe.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;1c7c4bca.1409">   <title>Re: Suggested approach to cooperation </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;1c7c4bca.1409</link>   <description> Hello Paul,<br>The previous e-mail contained some e-mail conversation (in the bottom) that should not be forwarded. Can you replace it by this one?<br>Thanks,<br>Henk<br><br>Dear All<br><br>ECORYS www.ecorys.com&lt;http://www.ecorys.com&lt;http://www.ecorys.com%3chttp:/www.ecorys.com&gt;&gt; is currently preparing a tender for a study on Simplification and mutual recognition in the construction sector under the Services Directive. The client is the European Commission, DG Internal Market and Services. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-01T06:49:39+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Henk Visscher - BK</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;1c7c4bca.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;279555bf.1408">   <title>ABSTRACT DEADLINE - COBRA Conference 2015 - Sydney, Australia - RICS Legal Research Symposium </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;279555bf.1408</link>   <description> COBRA Conference 2015 - Sydney, Australia, July 2015&lt;http://www.lawlectures.co.uk/w113/cobra2015.htm&gt;<br>CIB W113 - RICS Legal Research Symposium&lt;http://www.lawlectures.co.uk/w113/cobra2015.htm&gt;<br><br>[cid:image003.jpg@01CF9607.D648B3A0]&lt;http://www.lawlectures.co.uk/w113/cobra2015.htm&gt;<br><br>ABSTRACT DEADLINE - FRIDAY 19th SEPTEMBER 2014&lt;http://www.lawlectures.co.uk/w113/cobra2015.htm&gt;<br><br>A brief reminder that the ninth annual RICS Legal Research Symposium will take place in Sydney, Australia, between 8th and 10th July 2015. Once again, this is being organised by CIB Working Commission (W113) on Law and Dispute Resolution and supported by the International Journal of Law in the Built Environment. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-08-15T09:52:13+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Chynoweth Paul</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;279555bf.1408</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;2c0e4998.1407">   <title>Abstract Submission Arrangements - COBRA Conference 2015 - Sydney, Australia - RICS Legal Research Symposium </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;2c0e4998.1407</link>   <description> A brief update to advise that abstracts should be prepared using the attached template and emailed to cobra@rics.org&lt;mailto:cobra@rics.org&gt; by the stated deadline.<br><br>Copies of the template can also be downloaded from the following webpage: http://www.lawlectures.co.uk/w113/cobra2015.htm<br><br>Paul<br><br>From: Chynoweth Paul<br>Sent: 02 July 2014 15:11<br>To: 'bel-net@jiscmail.ac.uk'<br>Subject: COBRA Conference 2015 - Sydney, Australia - RICS Legal Research Symposium [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-07-09T15:21:42+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Chynoweth Paul</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;2c0e4998.1407</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;a047c708.1407">   <title>Special Edition Mediation Practice International Journal of Law in the Built Environment </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;a047c708.1407</link>   <description> Construction Mediation Practice Special Issue<br>International Journal of Law in the Built Environment<br><br>The International Journal of Law in the Built Environment, first published in 2009, is now firmly established as a leading international journal in its field and received the Emerald 'Best New Journal Award' in 2012.<br><br>For this issue, the Guest Editor, Dr Andrew Agapiou (Senior Lecturer, Department of Architecture at Strathclyde University, UK) invites papers on the theme: 'Construction Mediation Practice' [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-07-07T11:18:06+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Andrew Agapiou</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;a047c708.1407</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;c0ae8b19.1407">   <title>COBRA Conference 2015 - Sydney, Australia - RICS Legal Research Symposium </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;c0ae8b19.1407</link>   <description> COBRA Conference 2015 - Sydney, Australia, July 2015&lt;http://www.lawlectures.co.uk/w113/cobra2015.htm&gt;<br>CIB W113 - RICS Legal Research Symposium&lt;http://www.lawlectures.co.uk/w113/cobra2015.htm&gt;<br><br>[cid:image003.jpg@01CF9607.D648B3A0]&lt;http://www.lawlectures.co.uk/w113/cobra2015.htm&gt;<br><br>A brief message to let you know that the ninth annual RICS Legal Research Symposium will take place in Sydney, Australia, between 8th and 10th July 2015. Once again, this is being organised by CIB Working Commission (W113) on Law and Dispute Resolution and supported by the International Journal of Law in the Built Environment. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-07-02T14:10:51+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Chynoweth Paul</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;c0ae8b19.1407</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;d912a2f0.1405">   <title>Teaching opportunity: announcement of a construction law vacancy at the British University in Dubai </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;d912a2f0.1405</link>   <description> Dear colleagues<br><br>I would like to draw your attention to the construction law vacancy at the<br>British University in Dubai. To apply or to know more about this vacancy,<br>please follow this link http://www.buid.ac.ae/buid/page.php?id=1212<br>&lt;http://www.buid.ac.ae/buid/page.php?id=1212&amp;pageId=1188&gt; &amp;pageId=1188 .<br>Please do not hesitate to contact me if you require further information.<br><br>Best regards<br><br>Aymen    </description>   <dc:date>2014-05-20T18:28:05+04:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Professor Aymen Masadeh</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;d912a2f0.1405</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;6bb664d.1405">   <title>Environmental Law Special Issue - Free Access Now Available </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;6bb664d.1405</link>   <description> With apologies for the earlier technical problems, free online access to this special issue (below) is now available at the following URL until 19th June:<br><br>http://www.emeraldinsight.com/journals.htm?issn=1756-1450&amp;volume=6&amp;issue=1<br><br>I am assured that everything is now working but please alert Lucy Houlden at LHoulden@emeraldinsight.com&lt;mailto:LHoulden@emeraldinsight.com&gt; if you continue to experience any difficulties.<br><br>With many thanks<br><br>Paul<br><br>From: Chynoweth Paul<br>Sent: 09 May 2014 10:56<br>To: Chynoweth Paul<br>Subject: Environmental Law Special Issue [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-05-19T13:03:06+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Chynoweth Paul</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;6bb664d.1405</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;1d68a2c9.1405">   <title>FW: Madrid Workshop - promotion </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;1d68a2c9.1405</link>   <description> I am writing to invite you to participate in an expert workshop in Madrid, Spain on Friday 13 June 2014. The event is designed to bring together approximately 80 experts from across Europe working on issues including housing economics, law, housing rights, homeless services, social housing, financing and foundations, local governments, academics and other groups and individuals. We will facilitate the sharing of promising practices and policies, relevant case law, legal precedents and research and provide an opportunity to share ideas, concepts, and information in an atmosphere that stimulates future collaboration and projects. There will be simultaneous translation into English, [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-05-16T09:16:06+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Jane Ball</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;1d68a2c9.1405</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;fd3d28d3.1405">   <title>Environmental Law Special Issue </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;fd3d28d3.1405</link>   <description> Environmental Law Special issue - Editor: Julie Adshead<br><br>[cid:image007.jpg@01CF6B75.4B26BF90]<br><br>I am delighted to announce the publication of a special double issue of the IJLBE dedicated to the subject of Environmental Law. Under the editorship of Julie Adshead the issue contains the following 11 articles:<br><br>* Richard Macrory - Guest editorial: Judges and the government [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-05-09T09:56:17+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Chynoweth Paul</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEL-NET;fd3d28d3.1405</dc:identifier> </item>   </rdf:RDF>
